title: The Slaughtered Virgin of Zenopolis
description: BATHS, BANKS AND ROMAN INSURRECTIONDetective Inspector Capstan investigates a murder at Bath's almost famous Basin Museum, a hapless armed robbery, the theft of ancient Roman weaponry and the answer to “one across” in the local newspaper. Meanwhile, the city is under threat of Roman invasion and their leader, Becky Philips, is taking no prisoners.
author: David  Blake
